alert.note: Alert for Blaine (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 3:54PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Blaine County through 430 PM CDT... At 354 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Loyal to 4 miles north of Watonga. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Watonga and Hitchcock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
